name: An Evening Alone
description:
DEVELOPMENT CANCELLED.

BEST WHEN PLAYED IN WINDOWED MODE

You are trapped in what seems to be a neverending dream...

A Puzzle Platformer.

*NOTE: YOU ARE ABLE TO PLAY FROM BEGINNING TO END IN THIS RELEASE.

Playtime Est.:4+hrs

WATCH WALKTHROUGH TUTORIAL

Recommended System Requirements

RAM: 8gb

Processor: any intel i5

Graphics: 2gb of Video Memory

//Controls//
MAIN
WASD = Movement
Space = Jump
C = Crouch
Mouse Left = Grab Objects
Mouse Right = Throw

PYRAMID SPHERE PUZZLE
W/S = Forward/Backwards
Left Mouse = interact with left spheres
Right Mouse = Interact with Right Spheres

A Michael T Moreno Game.

Known Issues
-at launch, game may take some time to load.(no in-game loading though.)
-Staircase EVENT Script resets when crouching for some reason.
-No Save System.(Incomplete)
-No respawn in dream sections.
-when grabbing an object, if you rub the object across a wall, The collision will freak out and launch the object within the space of the area you are in.
-No Soundtrack.
-Possible framerate issues.

FIX FOR SOME ISSUES
-Play in windowed mode to fix framerate issues, which is the cause for other issues
